means: [语音学、韵律学]音量（指元音或音节的长短）

sentence.Network_en: Cheap goods are available, but not in sufficient quantities to satisfy demand.
sentence.Network_cn: 有一些廉价的商品，但是数量不足以满足需求。

sentence.Network_en: Radon is known to be harmful to humans in large quantities.
sentence.Network_cn: 众所周知，大量的氡会对人体造成伤害。

sentence.Network_en: They were used to imbibing enormous quantities of alcohol.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们过去习惯于狂饮烈酒。

list.abs: 常用物理英文词汇 - 豆丁网 ... physical balance 物理天平 physical quantity 物理量 physics 物理学.
需求量（quantity demanded），买者愿意并且能够购买的一种物品或劳务的数量。其中，“愿意” 强调买者的购买意愿，“能够”强调他 …
营销学术语英汉对照表 - MBA智库百科 ... quality 质量 quantity discount 数量折扣 question marks 问题类.
采购商务英语ABC - 豆丁网 ... enormous quantity 巨大的数量 maximum quantity 最大数量 minimum quantity 最小数量.

Sentence.sentence: At the same time, Americans purchase increasing quantities of sweets and sodas.

Of the produce that does appear in the supermarket, commonly used sales promotions frequently encourage customers to purchase excessive quantities which, in the case of perishable foodstuffs, inevitably generate wastage in the home.
Consumers in developed countries throw away nearly half of their food purchases because they tend to buy in excessive quantities
